item.title: Shuhei Yoshida Reveals His Most Anticipated Indie Game of 2025
item.description:
When it comes to indie games, arguably no one knows them better than Shuhei Yoshida, the former Head of the Indies Initiative at Sony Interactive Entertainment. Yoshida has had the pleasure of spending some quality time with dozens of indie games before they even launch, after which he has been known to make predictions about which of those games will rise to success. In many cases, he has been right, with his predictions regarding the success and popularity of Blue Prince and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 being his most recent. Now, the icon has revealed yet another indie title that is his currently most anticipated.

Game Rant recently interviewed Shuhei Yoshida at Gamescom Latam in Sao Paulo, Brazil, where he briefly touched on his most anticipated video games slated for launch this year. Among those was Sucker Punch's Ghost of Yotei , which Yoshida had already disclosed his opinions about to the public beforehand. However, Yoshida also revealed that his most anticipated indie title, now that Blue Prince and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 are behind him, is, quite surprisingly, Baby Steps .

Shuhei Yoshida Is Really Looking Forward to Baby Steps

Baby Steps Is a 'Literal Walking Simulator'

Developed by the creative trio behind Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy , Ape Out , and Stick it to the Stickman , Baby Steps has been dubbed a "literal walking simulator" in the most absurd and brilliant way possible. Players control a 35-year-old slacker named Nate who, after being mysteriously transported out of his basement, finds himself in a strange mountaintop wilderness. With no clue of where to go or how to survive, he is forced to do something he has never done before — learn to walk. Every leg movement, every foot placement, and every stumble is fully physics-based, making any progress players make both challenging and frequently hilarious.

Unlike most games where walking is as easy as it is in real life, Baby Steps turns it into a core mechanic of gameplay. Players use the analog sticks and triggers to manually control Nate's legs, meaning that even walking up a hill can be a dangerous feat. The game has no combat, no inventory, and no leveling up. The challenge is simply staying upright for the long haul. With its dry humor, minimalistic visuals, and relaxing open world, Baby Steps calls for its players to embrace failure and turns it into comedy, making it ripe for some hilarious gaming moments.

Shuhei Yoshida Thinks Baby Steps Will Be Popular Among Streamers

Though Yoshida didn't elaborate on every indie title he's currently keeping an eye on, he did take a moment to highlight Baby Steps as one that has stood out to him enough to earn his anticipation. With a laugh, he described how its bizarre concept and awkward controls won him over, particularly in its humor. The game is clearly and abundantly silly, but to Yoshida, that's all part of its appeal. In fact, it's precisely the kind of experimental experience he believes makes a great indie game. Regarding Baby Steps , Yoshida commented,

From an indie standpoint, my most anticipated game is called "Baby Steps." It's so funny. You might have seen the trailer. Learning to walk is a challenge, but when you start getting used to walking up a hill, you make one mistake and slide down, back to where you started. It's really really funny. The game will be super popular with the streamers because it's really funny for people to fail in that game.

While it might not be the kind of indie game people expect to steal the spotlight, Baby Steps could very well be the sleeper hit of 2025. If Yoshida's track record is any indication, it's a game worth keeping an eye on, not because it's fast-paced or flashy, but simply because of the humor and joy it has found in the simplest act of putting one foot in front of the other (and sometimes falling flat on your face while doing it).

Baby Steps
Drama
Comedy
Release Date

item.title: Captain Phasma Location and Rewards in Fortnite Galactic Battle
item.description:
Captain Phasma takes control of the First Order in Fortnite 's Star Wars season, providing players with a Galactic Battle boss that needs to be defeated. This chrome dome Stormtrooper has a posse of First Order Stormtroopers, and loot that players are definitely going to want to grab in order to get them the dub.

This guide will show players how to find Captain Phasma in Fortnite , along with how to beat her and what her loot does, as it's a pretty useful set of equipment that she drops upon her defeat, including Phasma's Blaster Medallion, which will easily become the meta with the new Blasters this season.

Where to Find Captain Phasma in Fortnite

Captain Phasma is located in the First Order Base , a POI found on the top right of the Battle Royale map. Players can always check the map to locate Phasma thanks to the fact that her Medallion is tracked, but she will always be at the First Order Base regardless. Captain Phasma likes to roam the hangar, which is the far north area of the First Order Base, and she will often patrol this large room with other First Order Stormtroopers as her bodyguards.

How to Beat Captain Phasma in Fortnite

Captain Phasma is extremely easy to beat, so long as players come prepared. Bringing along even just two Blaster Rifles will get the job done, as the infinite ammo of a Blaster means that players do not have to worry about being short on supplies. It's also advised to bring some Shield Potions, as while Captain Phasma isn't a very good shot, she likes to throw grenades that must be avoided due to the high damage that they deal.

The easiest way to defeat Captain Phasma in Fortnite is to take care of her Stormtrooper guards, and then to hide behind the cover made available in the room and shoot her with your Blasters, alternating between them as they overheat. Captain Phasma has around 600 health , so it shouldn't take too long to beat her.

How to Get Captain Phasma's Medallion in Fortnite (and What it Does)

  • Improves blaster weapons with reduced heat generation and faster cooldowns. Reveals your location on the map.

Players can get Phasma's Blaster Medallion by defeating Captain Phasma in combat, and upon picking up this Medallion, players will have a great permanent effect to use so long as the Medallion stays equipped. The Blaster Medallion will improve all weapons, since all weapons in Galactic Battle are blasters, meaning this becomes a must-have Medallion for how it will cool down faster and take more shots to build heat generation.

How to Get Captain Phasma's F-11D Blaster Rifle in Fortnite (and What it Does)

  • Captain Phasma's personal F-11D Blaster, handcrafted to maximize fire rate and equip speed.

Damage

30

Fire Rate

6.65

Once players defeat Captain Phasma, they will be able to pick up Captain Phasma's F-11D Blaster. This weapon acts as a hybrid of an SMG and Assault Rifle, providing infinite ammo due to the fact that it's a Blaster, yet also obtaining a unique identity due to its faster fire rate and equip speed compared to other F-11D Blasters.

item.title: Roblox: Basketball Zero Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Basketball Zero Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Basketball Zero
  • How to Get More Basketball Zero Codes

Basketball Zero is a fast-paced and simple in gameplay mechanics basketball simulator that can easily drag you into long hours of play. Also, between matches, you can spin for different Styles and Zones of play, and if you're lucky, get some cool skills that will help you during the game.

Actually, to succeed and get legendary or even mythical Styles or Zones, you will need to spend a lot of time getting Spins. To partially make it easier, just like in other Roblox games, in Basketball Zero , you can redeem codes that will bring you a lot of Spins and even Lucky Spins.

Updated May 2, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Basketball Zero just got a fresh update that includes a new way to earn rewards. If you’re looking to boost your progress with extra spins or in-game currency, now’s a good time to take advantage. Be sure to check back often for future updates and drops.

All Basketball Zero Codes

Working Basketball Zero Codes

  • TATLISPATCHWOW - Redeem this code to get Spins and Money. (NEW)
  • 2.5MLIKES - Redeem this code to get Spins.

Expired Basketball Zero Codes

  • 300KINTERESTED - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • CHROLLOGIFT - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • 200KLOCK - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • 150KLOCK - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • 1.5MLIKES - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • 10klikesyt - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • SUNDAYPATCH - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • YIPPEE3V3 - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • 15KLIKESYT - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • 150KINTERESTED2 - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • 10KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • JACKPOT - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • SRRYFORCRASH - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • JACKPOTTOMORROW - Redeem this code to get Rewards.
  • CHROLLOFORGOT - Redeem this code to get Rewards.
  • CHROLLOMVP - Redeem this code to get 3 Lucky Spins, 2 Lucky Zone Spins, 3 Zone Color Spins.
  • TATLISCODE - Redeem this code to get 2 Lucky Style Spins, 2 Lucky Zone Spins, 10k Money.
  • 150kevent - Redeem this code to get 3 Lucky Style Spins, 2 Zone Color Spins, 2 Trail Color Spins.
  • WOW100K - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • 1MLIKES - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • 400KWOW - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • 100KW - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • WCHROLLO - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • 500KLIKES - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • 350KLIKES - Redeem this code to get rewards.
  • 150KLIKES - Redeem this code to get two Lucky Spins and two Lucky Zone.
  • 50KLIKES - Redeem this code to get two Lucky Spins and two Lucky Zone.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get five Style Spins

Redeeming Basketball Zero codes is one of the few ways to get Spins, and it's a very effective one at that. So, don't miss this opportunity to get some freebies, because each code has a certain expiration date, after which it becomes invalid and offers no rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for Basketball Zero

Redeeming Basketball Zero codes is no more difficult than in most other Roblox games and will take you a few clicks. Here is also an informative and clear guide on how to redeem Basketball Zero codes and get rewards:

  • Launch Basketball Zero .
  • Pay attention to the bottom of the screen. There will be a bunch of buttons placed in a row. Among them, interact with the last one, which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Redeem button. Now, in the input field, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned working codes.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Basketball Zero Codes

To find more Roblox codes and, therefore, more rewards, you will need to visit and carefully monitor the main official Basketball Zero social media pages. The developers often share codes when the community reaches a goal of likes rated for the game, so just visit these pages from time to time to see the progress:

  • Official Basketball Zero Roblox group.
  • Official Basketball Zero Discord server.
  • Official Basketball Zero YouTube channel.

item.title: Is Arc Raiders the Next Big Extraction Shooter?
item.description: Arc raiders seeks to carve out its place in the genre by mixing together visual style, quality gameplay, and an addicting extraction loop. Arc Raiders already looks to have the makings of something great and has garnered a lot of community excitement so today on Game Rant let's talk about the hype surrounding Arc Raiders.

item.title: Roblox: Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY Codes
  • How to Redeem Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY Codes
  • How to Get More Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY Codes

Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY is probably one of the most popular clicker simulators on the platform. Players only need to blow bubble gum and sell it to progress. But the better the gum you buy, the more effort it will take to blow it. Therefore, we recommend you take a look at the Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY codes.

As expected from Roblox codes, they contain various goodies from the developers. You can even find high-tier potions. However, players should hurry, as their validity period is limited.

Updated May 2, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There’s a new code available in Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY that gives you more Infinity Elixir. You can redeem it now to boost your resources. It joins a small list of other codes offering boxes and potions. Be sure to use it soon in case it’s a limited-time offer. Check back later in case more codes are added.

All Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY Codes

Working Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY Codes

  • whoops - Redeem this code to get Infinity Elixir. (NEW)
  • easter - Redeem this code to get 4 Mystery Boxes
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get a Mystery Box
  • Lucky - Redeem this code to get Luck Potion V

Expired Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY Codes

  • Throwback - Redeem this code to get 1 Infinity Elixir
  • Thanks - Redeem this code to get 2 Mystery Boxes

At the beginning of your adventure, you will blow bubble gum and buy new upgrades quite quickly. However, without additional multipliers, you will not achieve much. So, players should invest part of the earned money in hatching pets. As always, different eggs drop different pets, each of which has unique multipliers. And if you want to get all the rare animals in a short time, then Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY codes will help you with this.

Most of these Roblox codes grant players Mystery Boxes. When you open one, you will randomly receive different items, such as money, Gems, or even Potions. At the same time, some rare codes can offer you 5-tier potions. So you definitely do not want to miss them.

How to Redeem Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY Codes

Using codes in Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY is no different from most other Roblox games. So, most players will have no problem with it. If this is your first gaming experience, then you just need to follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY .
  • Then, click on the Codes button on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code in the corresponding window.
  • Finally, click Redeem to claim free goodies.

How to Get More Bubble Gum Simulator INFINITY Codes

Now that you know how these Roblox codes can speed up your progress, you will want to know how not to miss new rewards from the developers. To do this, players must follow the developers' official social media pages. There you will find all the latest news first-hand:

  • Rumble Studios YouTube channel
  • Rumble Studios X page
  • Rumble Studios Discord server
